hooks.command: __claudebar_hook() { PORT=$(cat "$HOME/.claude/claudebar-hook-port" 2>/dev/null || echo 19847); cat | curl -s -X POST "http://localhost:${PORT}/hook" -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d @- > /dev/null 2>&1 & }; __claudebar_hook

__claudebar_hook() { PORT=$(cat "$HOME/.claude/claudebar-hook-port" 2>/dev/null || echo 19847); cat | curl -s -X POST "http://localhost:${PORT}/hook" -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d @- > /dev/null 2>&1 & }; __claudebar_hook
